Keywords: Acolytes , Brotherhood of Mutants , Herald , Marauders , Past , Quiet Council , X-Men
Real Name: Bennet du Paris
Special Powers
KRAKOAN REVIVAL: For all characters with this trait, when a friendly standard character with the X-Men keyword and a lower point value would be KO'd by an opposing effect, you may instead choose to turn that character to it's starting click (this game) and place them adjacent to a friendly character that can use this trait. If you do, your opponent scores that character and generates a bystander on this card (of their choice) adjacent to any of their characters. Your opponent then scores 10 points for every bystander they generated this game via this trait, regardless of source.
OVERWHELMING PSIONIC MIGHT: Mind Control. When Exodus uses it, after resolutions deal a hit character damage equal to Exodus's damage value.
IMMORTAL ACOLYTE: Energy Shield/Deflection. // Once per turn when a friendly character is healed or turned to their starting click, heal Exodus 1 click.

September 19, 2021
Maxphyte
Enhancement and Empower wouldn’t work for him because they only apply during the attack. Exodus’ damage dealing from his trait happens after resolutions. You would need to use stuff like what the House of X Fast Force and Uncommon Forges offer where those modifiers apply for the turn or when the prerequisite is met (like for the FF Forge where you just have to be adjacent or have the X-Men keyword)
September 18, 2021
foxxwertas
Load him up with 3 cheap Enhancements, then MC something and deal 7 damage skating right past STOP clicks because it's not damage from an attack as STOP is currently worded. He could take out some heavy hitters.
September 1, 2021
pokolo
Wish he had brotherhood TA
August 12, 2021
Goop
Mind control that does damage is just amazing. You can definitely play him with any number of xmen healing figures to keep him healing every turn as well. He's a little expensive at 95pts but he's worth it. The damage dealt by his effect is also not part of the attack, so it can bypass stop clicks. Thats really nice too.
June 11, 2021
Dortmuner
Yeah, I don't know what I was thinking when I posted above, other than not seeing the colors correctly. I still like him a lot. And honestly would rather have ESD there than Toughness and he should be healing up consistently throughout the battle.
June 11, 2021
cainvoss
He does not have stealth and his ESD doesn't kick in until click 3 and at that point he has zero damage reducers. He also loses move and attack capabilities after click 2. I would pair him with the 40 point Magneto on Brotherhood teams for Magneto's ESD and even though the power gem is tempting, I like the Goblin Glider more so that he starts with Hypersonic Speed and then running shot for clicks 3 and on. I love the character but he's a bit of a glass cannon in my opinion.
June 4, 2021
Dortmuner
Another great MC character I really want. And another one that the Power Gem plays well with. 12 attack with 6 damage on a character who you also can attack with. With all the healing available with the X-Men TA and specials, and Krakoan revival, he'll be healing a ton. Plus he can heal others with X-Men TA and heal himself if he takes damage from it. A little expensive, but you get a lot of value.
